sentences.en: One arrangement now under strain is the 1960 Indus Waters Treaty between India and Pakistan.

sentences.en: Theremains of the Indus valley civilisation cover an area of Pakistan andnorth-west India about a quarter the size of Europe.

sentences.en: This paper deals with tests carried out on a lab - scale drying apparatus simulating indus - trial conditions.

sentences.en: This test system provides important promotion for applying EPA widely in Indus - trial automation field.

sentences.en: Those cattle are both assets and income generators for Pakistani villagers along the Indus River.
